description: The nGenius Server based trap that is generated when
one of the alerting facilities within nGenius triggers an alert.
This could be a pass through of a probe-based alert or an Analytics generated
alert.

Summary.eval: ($v4 eq '') ? 'Server-based alarm raised on nGenius server' : '$v4'

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverBasedTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.0 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsThreshold c 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s "wan103\\ ifn4\\ DLCI-321\\ TOTAL\\ Octets\\ Falling\\ threshold\\ reached\\ 83727\\ bytes" NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsValue i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsSeverity s Critical NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0

$SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverBasedTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.9 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsThreshold c 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s "Probe107\\ ifn3\\ IN\\ UTIL\\ Rising\\ threshold\\ reached\\ 80%" NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsValue i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsSeverity s Warning NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0

description: The Device interface which caused this alarm to be generated.
For example If interface #3 caused this then this object
should be set to ifIndex.3
If this alarm was set on a device variable for example,
Memory Utilization, then this object should be set to
ifIndex.0.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource

description: The internet address of the device which caused this alarm to be
generated.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress

description: The threshold value which was configured for this alarm.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsThreshold

description: The alarms description providing useful information about the
alarm. It is recommended to provide information such as
device-name ,interface-name, virtual-Interface, complete
variable name indicating IN/OUT, unit of threshold value
For example
Probe107 ifn3 IN UTIL Rising threshold reached 80%
wan103 ifn4 DLCI-321 TOTAL Octets Falling threshold reached 83727 bytes
wan104 ifn4 DLCI-421 Total FTP-DATA Utilization exceeds 70%
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription

description: The actual value which caused this alarm to be triggered.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsValue

description: The interval in seconds over which the data is sampled .
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval

description: The Display Name of the source of the trap. This can be of the following
format Device(probe/link) Name:Interface Name:Virtual Id:QOS level.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName

description: The URL String that can be used to launch with context back into the nGenius Product.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL

description: A key-value pair string separated by commas used to convey evidence. The specifc keys and
values would be dependent on the trap type. The following keys are initially supported:
App=HTTP,RouterAddress=x.x.x.x, RouterIfn=x, RouterMAC=x.x.x.x.x.x, clientAddress=x.x.x.x,
serverAddress=y.y.y.y, Metric=IN-UTIL
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsEvidence

description: A unique string ID representing this alert. It is garaunteed to be unique across distributed
nGenius servers
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID

description: A string value representing the severity of the alert. Possible values are Critical, Warning.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsSeverity

description: The internet address type for the device which caused this alarm to be
generated.
variables.name: NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType

description: The nGenius Server based cleartrap that is generated when
an an alarm entry has been cleared.

Summary.eval: ($v4 eq '') ? 'Server-based alarm cleared on nGenius server' : '$v4'

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverBasedClearTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.0 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsThreshold c 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s "wan103\\ ifn4\\ DLCI-321\\ TOTAL\\ Octets\\ Falling\\ threshold\\ reached\\ 83727\\ bytes" NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsValue i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsSeverity s Critical NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0

$SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverBasedClearTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.9 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsThreshold c 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s "Probe107\\ ifn3\\ IN\\ UTIL\\ Rising\\ threshold\\ reached\\ 80%" NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsValue i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsSeverity s Warning NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0

description: The nGenius Server based trap that is generated when
one of the situation facilities within nGenius triggers a situation.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.1 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationCauseEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationImpactEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTriggerAddressType s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTriggerAddress s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTrap NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1.0 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddress s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDescription s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsInterval i 9999 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDataSourceName s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsURL s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsAlertID s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::serverAlarmsDeviceAddressType i 0 NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationCauseEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationImpactEvidence s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTriggerAddressType s EXAMPLE NETSCOUT-SERVER-MIB::situationTriggerAddress s EXAMPLE

a situation has been cleared.
